IntegerDataType.name: CFE_ResourceId_t
IntegerDataType.LongDescription: * * @brief A type that provides a common, abstract identifier for * all ES managed resources (e.g. apps, tasks, counters, etc). * * Fundamentally an unsigned integer but users should treat it as * opaque, and only go through the ES API for introspection.

SubRangeDataType.name: CFE_RESOURCEID_BASE_TYPE
SubRangeDataType.LongDescription: * * @brief A macro providing a type for app-specific IDs * * Local ID types are just direct typedefs to CFE_ResourceId_t in this mode, * this means all ID values can be interchanged.
